name: SGLTK
tagline: A collection of easy to use OpenGL tools.
body:
### What is SGLTK?
SGLTK (**S**imple open**GL** **T**ool**K**it) is a library based on [SDL2](https://www.libsdl.org/index.php), [GLEW](http://glew.sourceforge.net/), [GLM](http://glm.g-truc.net/0.9.6/index.html), [OpenGL](https://www.opengl.org/) and [Assimp](http://assimp.sourceforge.net/). It provides simple tools to create OpenGL applications.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
